name: One Chomp
description:
Herd fish together so you can eat as many as you can in one chomp! Try to fill your tummy with the least number of tries.

Use LEFT and RIGHT or A and D to turn.

Use SPACE to chomp!

Made in 48 hours for Game Jam Aotearoa 2020 https://www.gamejam.nz/

Team
Programming - Tim
Hand Drawn Art - Veronica
Fish Swarming Engineer - John
Play Testing - Jack, Isaac, Alya, Kylie, Anna, Aaron
